io.artframework.annotations

Annotation Type Config


  • @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD,FIELD,PARAMETER})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Config
    This annotation makes it possible to load your configuration from a file.

    Specify a path to your config file as the value. The base of the path is the base path configured in the global art config. One use case for this would be inside a class that implements the Configurable interface.

    If you do not specify this annotation on the config and the configurable class is a ArtModule, the identifier of the module will be used as the config name.

    You can either annotate the parameter of the load(...) method, the method itself, or the config or art class. 

    {@code
 public class MyModule implements Module, Configurable {

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String value
      The relative or absolute path to the config file.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        The relative or absolute path to the config file.

        The file will always be parsed as YAML regardless of the extension.

        Returns:
        the path to the config file
